attributes.action: For the government to stop the wholesale selling of British businesses to foreign investors or companies
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There seems to be a movement to sell off all British Companies.We have NO British owned mass produced car manufacturer.
Most of our WATER is foreign owned and now
our Banks etc are being targeted where will this leave us in a few years? Totally Foreign Owned, is there no British Pride left at all?

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
